lead_paragraph: Canadian National Railway and Unifor, the union representing its 4,800 mechanical, clerical and trucking workers, struck a deal late Monday.

headline.main: Canada's Biggest Railroad Reaches Labor Deal
headline.print_headline: Canada's Biggest Railroad Reaches Labor Deal

snippet: Canadian National Railway and Unifor, the union representing its 4,800 mechanical, clerical and trucking workers, struck a deal late Monday.
